entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023
